statements: DELETE FROM peak_season_data WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'M';
DELETE FROM peak_season_data WHERE season_id = 1 AND customer_age > 30;
DELETE FROM peak_season_data WHERE customer_gender = 'F' AND season_name = 'Summer';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM peak_seasons WHERE start_date < '2021-06-01' AND end_date > '2021-08-31';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND city = 'New York';
